General.Name: Shenzhen Longsys Electronics Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Shenzhen Longsys Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of memory storage products worldwide. Its products portfolio includes embedded storage products, including industrial storage, industrial embedded multimedia card (eMMC), industrial wide-temperature eMMC, and automotive 3 eMMC; NAND-based multi-chip packages; SLC parallel NAND flashes; serial peripheral interface NAND flashes; DDR; and T-flash products, as well as solid-state drives, mobile storage products, and memory modules. The company's products have applications in smartphones, smart TVs, tablets, computers, communication devices, wearable devices, Internet of Things, security monitoring, industrial control, automotive electronics, and personal mobile storage. It offers its products under the Lexar and FORESEE brand names. Shenzhen Longsys Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
